title: Messenger
description:
Messenger is a communication app that allows you to chat with the whole world for free. You can either choose to chat with your friends only or find new people to chat with. Messenger includes simple games that make chatting with friends more interesting and are a fun way to break the ice when meeting new people.
Messenger functions:
--> chat with the whole world
--> chat with friends
--> social login
--> social share
--> random messenger with filters
--> play games with your friends
--> random game
Download and leave a review, please be advised that this just Messenger application is still in BETA. Your reviews will drive our story forward and we will consider all the "wanted" features left in reviews for our further development.
Thanks for your download
Your Messenger
